results.content: Very good tutorial. Explained in very simple language.

results.content: Solid course with great examples.  Audio was a little tough to hear in places.
results.content_html: Solid course with great examples. Audio was a little tough to hear in places.

results.content:
Pretty much just goes through very basic examples for most of it. Most I can just research on my own online. Last slide they have these exercises you can do and they give you solution without explaining it though in the videos. If they went through each exercise solution in the videos, I'd give it 4 stars.

Again, get it if you get it cheaper than the $59 price
